SUMMARY:  INNER | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL:  FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

com.heaton.bot.catbot
Class CatBot

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.heaton.bot.catbot.CatBot
public class CatBot
extends java.lang.Object

A CatBot is a bot that is designed to be able to get information from a variety of sites in the same category. This class lays the framework for CatBots.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Jeff Heaton

_uid

protected java.lang.String _uid
A user ID for the catbot to use. May not be used by some implementations of the CatBot.

A password for the catbot to use. May not be used by some implementations of the CatBot.

A country for the catbot to use. May not be used by some implementations of the CatBot.

The URL that the CatBot starts at.

_http

protected HTTP _http
The HTTP object to be used by this CatBot.

_recognizers

protected java.util.Vector _recognizers
A list of recognizers. See the Recognize class for more info on what a Recognizer is.

_primeRecognizer

protected Recognize _primeRecognizer
The prime recognizer that will recognize the ultimate information that the CatBot is seeking.

getRecognizers

public java.util.Vector getRecognizers()
Get the list of recognizers that should be used by this CatBot.
Returns:
The list of recoginzers used by this CatBot.

standardRecognition

protected HTMLPage standardRecognition()
                                throws java.io.IOException,
                                       javax.swing.text.BadLocationException
This method can be called to cause the CatBot to begin moving through the site with a set of recognizers. The CatBot will continue until the prime recognizer recognizes something, or all recognizers have been exhausted.
Returns:
True if the recognition was successful.
Throws:
java.io.IOException -  
javax.swing.text.BadLocationException -
